title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     January 19, 2016  Prescribed Burn Planned for Lake Meredith National Recreation Area  A single prescribed burn is planned totaling approximately 1,200 acres. Prescribed burning will occur at the south end of the park in the Rosita off-road area.   September 24, 2015  Flintfest 2015  Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument will host FlintFest 2015 on Saturday, October 3, and Sunday, October 4, 2015.   September 22, 2015  Small Fry Fishing Tournament 2015  Lake Meredith National Recreation Area will again be hosting the annual Small Fry Fishing Tournament, to be held this Saturday, September 26, at the Stilling Basin at Spring Canyon.   September 16, 2015  Bike & Hike of the Month  Explore Dolomite Point Road On Your Bike with a Ranger!   September 15, 2015  Monarch Morning  Lake Meredith National Recreation Area and Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument will conduct a monarch butterfly program called "MONARCH MORNING" from 9 a.m.- 12:00 p.m. on Sept. 16 in the Alibates Visitors Center.   September 04, 2015  Every Kid In A Park!  New National Program Encourages Families and Classes to Visit National Parks
